title: ISic020481. ISic020481
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΓΟΡΓΕ[------].ΦΟΣ

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

If the inscription is to be read anti-clockwise, as if it were arranged in a circular way, Arena proposes to integrate it as Γοργε[ῖος κόρ]υφος, variation of the Homeric Γοργείη κεφαλή ('the head of the Gorgon', Il. 5.741; Od. 11.634).

bibliography

  • Arena 2002 34, pl. XIII.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • 45.1360 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Dubois 1989 145 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • 29.0863 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
